Articles.Content:
This definitely happens when reverting to the VAB, possibly when reverting to launch, and also could have to do with loading quicksaves. At least, in my save as of a few days ago. It was working for me and it still works for other people, but now this happens. When this bug is in effect, the game returns a blank white square in place of your chosen flag and existing quicksaves and workspaces do not appear to be read by the game. If you quit the game and reload a quicksave that was made when this bug was in effect, it'll come back just as before. Workspace loading doesn't work so if you were making a ship when you realised this bug was in effect, you can only load it using quicksaves and will not be able to bring it back into a healthy save. You can view quicksaves that were made with this bug in effect, but when you load it, you can't come back without a relaunch, hence your creations being stuck and unrecoverable (as far as I know).

https://pastebin.com/Yee2YaWa

https://pastebin.com/WhdKdxMs
